title: Shaun White on return to snowboarding, Beijing 2022, and stillness
description: With 100 days to go until the Winter Olympic Games officially start in Beijing, China, snowboarding legend Shaun White talks about his decision to attempt to make a fifth Olympic Games. The three-time Olympian spoke about spending time with his new girlfriend: Vampire Diaries actress Nina Dobrev. Plus, the 35-year-old talks about how he plans to take care of his body during the unforgiving U.S. Olympic qualification process.
